DataElement.preferredName: Concurrent Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A repsonse for questions addressing the use of concurrent agents in order to determine eligiblity for clinical trial participation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Concurrent Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Occurring or operating at the same time._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering a medical product or other agent._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Occurring or operating at the same time.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering a medical product or other agent.

Concepts.definition: Occurring or operating at the same time.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering a medical product or other agent.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient require concurre
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require concurrent administration of any type of agent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require concurrent administration of valproic acid?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require concomitant therapy with phenytoin, phenobarbital, carbamazepine, or valproic acid?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any concurrent chemotherapy, immune therapy, biologic, or hormonal therapy for cancer treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require concomitant therapy with phenytoin, phenobarbital, or carbamazepine?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Will Radium-223 dichloride be given concurrently with abiraterone plus prednisone/prednisolone?
